text: Shamsuzzaman Dudu is a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician and the former Member of Parliament from Chuadanga-1. He is the vice-Chairman of Bangladesh Nationalist Party. ==Career== Dudu served as the secretary of Jatiyatabadi Krishak Dal and as an adviser to Bangladesh Nationalist Party Chairperson Khaleda Zia. ==References== ==External links== Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:Living people Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shamsuzzaman Dudu
